name: Md Salman
details: I ordered 2 KG ajwa from them, they deliver on timely manner. Their quality is good too. I think they may consider their pricing a bit. Where other vendor selling dates about 150-200 tk less for per kg

name: Abul Kashem
details: Maa Shaa Allah…they are providing authentic and fresh products with fast delivery service….I brought fresh ajwa dates from them….too good

name: Hosne Ara
details: Garden fresh dates, good quality. Fast delivery, highly recommended.

name: Jesmin Akhter
details: I ordered 2 kg Ajwa dates from abroad, they deliver to my home within a short time. Their dates quality was really good. Highly recommended

name: Noor e Nasrin
details: Product was Good And fresh.thank you Khejur Bd!

name: Shanto Ahmed
details: i ordered 1st time here, products were really good and looks delicious.highly recommended.

name: Ahmed Shuvo
details: Highly Recommend this website. It was good and fresh

name: Jafar Ullah
details: Dam kichuta beshi, kintu product peye ami satisfied. Suvo kamona roilo, apnader jonno.
